title: Hosea Week 1 with Francine Rivers
description:
For the first week of our Hosea study, Raechel and Amanda talk about God’s redeeming love with best-selling author, Francine Rivers. Together, they discuss the opening chapters of this book of minor prophecy, which tells a divine love story about a God who gives faithful love from His people. Listen along as we contemplate what it looks like to keep our eyes fixed on the God who is bigger than even the hardest parts of our stories. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Hosea reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Hosea collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/hosea-week-1-with-francine-rivers
